metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7751 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The svg_probe function in libavformat/img2dec.c in FFmpeg through 3.4.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Infinite Loop) via a crafted XML file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-7751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec58 - 7:4.0-1
libavdevice58 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter7 - 7:4.0-1
libavformat-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavformat-extra58 - 7:4.0-1
libavformat58 - 7:4.0-1
libavutil56 - 7:4.0-1
libpostproc55 - 7:4.0-1
libswresample3 - 7:4.0-1
libswscale5 - 7:4.0-1
No subscription required
